name: World of Warships: Legends — Arkansas Brawler
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Arkansas Brawler
description:
Set sail for victory with Arkansas and Iwaki! Each ship has a unique playstyle and more upgrade slots than usual, making them potent additions to your fleet! Play with the speedy Iwaki, or as a heavy brawler with Arkansas!

These ships come with 3 days of Premium Account and an amount of Commander XP.
